snippet: A skeptic finds out that wearing a 60-pound suit of armor like the kind used on the History channel’s new series “Full Metal Jousting” is not for the faint of ... anything.
abstract: History Channel series Full Metal Jousting puts contestants in heavy suits of armor and attempts to teach them the sport of jousting.
lead_paragraph: A skeptic finds out that wearing a 60-pound suit of armor like the kind used on the History channel’s new series “Full Metal Jousting” is not for the faint of ... anything.

headline.seo: ‘Full Metal Jousting’ Gear. No, It’s Not Tinfoil.
headline.main: Try Medieval Hot Pants? Surely, You Joust
